Text:
it just quits on me, i get this

the program Sin.exe has encountered a serious problem and needs to close. we are sorry for the inconvenience.

this can be caused by a problem in the program or a deficiency in wine. you may want to check http://appdb.winehg.org for tips about running this application.

if the problem is not perent under windows and has not been reported yet, you can report it at http://bugs.winehq.org

any help.
it's all good

It works BUT... 
1. Every time it loads the textures get messed up and i have to change the video settings each time or it will crash.

2. If I use the zoom option for the gun it crashes.

Any fix?

alright.. well i found no problem in it (aside from it crashing when i zoomed in the gun. i just didnt do it and it was fine...)  BUT! at a point in the game, in the first "level" even theres a point where the story freezes and you can not continue..  i did a little looking around and it is a anti-piracy tool the creators put in..  if there's a way you can fix that thenoobish then great :) if not still a good torrent :P well done
they are correct. In the downloaded version you will get stuck at the level of the lab and be unable to do anything. Nice lil' anti piracy thang goin' on.....

You gave credit to doc for this one, so why not give credit to all the other members of the PortingTeam who's ports you've uploaded here....huh?

That picture was photoshopped by me by the way....just so you know!

PLZ SEED, I've uploaded more than 3gigs and I'm still stuck @ 99.7%.... This is BS yall. My upload speeds are 200kb/s and my download is .1-5kb/s... WFT! I'm restricting my upload speed to 1 until someone allows me to download at a faster speed. Utter BS.
Does it work on Windows? I have downloaded this game without knowledge
